div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 342 Chaidari, Attica, 1929 (230) Burial: c. 86 B.C. (T) Contents: 483 AE Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 Imbros: 1 (as SNGCop. 967) Lemnos, Athenian Cleruchs: 3 (Athena hd./ Zeus hd., ΑΘΕ-ΛΗΜΝ) Athens: 3 (3rd cent.) 475 New Style (late types) Disposition: Athens Constantopoulos, BCH 1929, p. 492 According to recent information this hd. and nos. 341 and 343 are very likely a single find
